-e ---

surprisingly diversive words : old roots, not wanderword

𓎓 𓏏 𓉐 | byre | ⇔ tent 𓎆

𓄚 𓈖 𓋳 "tent"

𓄚 𓈖 𓋳 σκανά skaná σκηνή skēnḗ σκηνή skiní ⇔ skins

𓄚 very enigmatic xenotic oxymoron syllable, thankfully rarely used
𓄚 OX
𓄚 σκ sek:cut secure section inner sanctuary 𓄚 TC/C'T centaur center 𒋢 𒀊 kuš.eš₃ KUŠ.AB "tent"

𓄚 𓈖 𓋳 σκηνή skēnḗ skins (tent) ⲥⲕⲉⲡⲏ 𓎃
𓄚 𓈖 𓋳 tent/Zelt tabernāculum tentōrium

𓍿 𓈖 𓆑 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓋳 tent "sail" 𓊡 𓏲 #ṯꜣwⁿ <> 𓌢 𓈖 𓂉 scent

𓇋 𓌳 𓂝 𓅓 𓉐 •jalam ≈ 𒍝𒇴 za-lam zalam 𒍝𒇴𒃻 "tent"
𓇋 𓌳 𓂝 𓅓 𓉐 •ʿSIC.a.m ʿscama 𓄚 𓋳 σκανά skaná 𓄚 𓈖 𓋳 σκηνή skēnḗ σκηνή skiní "tent" ⇔ skins 𓌳
𓇋 𓌳 𓂝 𓅓 𓉐 •ʿSIC.am sʿcama 𓄚 ≈ خيمة ḵēma "tent" ኀይመት ḫäymät Heimat Heime (tents) 𓄚 𓈖 𓋳 (𓈖 old mn)

𓆭 𓅓 𓉐 | tent |

𓋴 𓆭 ϣⲉ še 𒄑 cis ≈ sic in σκηνή skiní 𓆭 :
𓆭 𓅱 𓉐 šator "tent"
𓆭 𓅱 𓉐 Tannentore tentōrium tents
𓆭 𓅱 𓉐 Häute ⇔ 𓉗 huts 𓉔 𓄿 𓅱 𓏏 𓇲 𓏨
𓆭 𓅱 𓉐 تنبو tanbu tent
𓆭𓅓
𓆭 𓅓 𓉐 ख़ैमा xaimā 𓉔 ກະໂຈມ ka chōm خَيْمَة ḵayma Kammer
𓆭 𓅓 𓉐 তামীঘৰা tamighora তম্বু tombu تنبو tanbu tent ++
𓆭 𓅓 𓉐 tree.m.tor gEŠ.M
𓆭𓅓𓅱𓉐 Š.M.W.tor Semit
𓇋𓆭𓐝𓅱𓉐 al khEyma الخيمة ⇔ he'mu (tent) Q.E.D.
⇔ tomb, camp

𓄚𓈖𓋳⇔𓆭𓅓𓅱𓉐 similar word with different orthography, or very different word?
IF these words are indeed similar we can relate
𓈖𓋳 ngMn ⋍ 𓅓𓅱 mWn of sorts
𓄚𓈖⇔𓆭 Tanne ⋍ tent

Our suspicion is that these words are related, albeit representing different stages:
𓆭𓅓𓉐 তামীঘৰা tamighora তম্বু tombu tanbu 𓆭𓅱𓉐 tent

𓎛 𓏏 𓍔 𓄿 𓏤 | sail | ἱστίον histíon 𓊢 𓊡
𓎛 𓏏 𓍔 𓄿 𓏲 󴤬 | set sail | ⇔ st 𓊢 stand …
𓎛 𓏏 𓍔 𓄿 𓏤 | sail, awning (Markise)| τέντα ténta ტენტი ṭenṭi *tenda •tendita ⇔ tent +++

The 𓉐 ঘৰা ghora კარავი ḳaravi : چادر çadir reading is crystal clear

𓄚𓈖𓋳 oxen/oxel 𐎀𐎅𐎍 ảhl אוהל \ אֹהֶל óhel 𓉔 hall ?

𓆭𓅓𓅱𓉐 jew.br.w hebrew !! (sick reading)
